name: Snowbirds
description:
🎮 The Game

❄️ Enjoy a wholesome winter tale told by two birds.
❄️ Follow Blue and Red on a journey through the hills of Moma.
❄️ Made with love for the 2022 Winter Story Jam.

⌨️ Controls

Fly with WASD, arrow keys, or joystick

👤 Credits

Story, Art, Design - Thomas Boone
Music, Code - Tijmen Matthys

❤️ Thanks for playing & happy holidays!
💬 Comment below to share your thoughts & suggestions.
